akas: Ted Parker's Quickies USA (informal alternative title)
akas from release info: Ted Parker's Quickies USA (informal alternative title)

1.title: Richard Tanner
1.plot: Richard Tanner is the brains behind A Buck Short Productions, the ATLwood film company responsible for FRANKENTHUG (2017), and more tasty indie film work.

2.title: Catherine Mary Stewart and Kelli Maroney
2.plot: CATHERINE MARY STEWART and KELLI MARONEY: That's right, this just happened. Both of the 'NIGHT OF THE COMET (1984) heroines have saved Ted from comet zombies and are both discussing their individual projects. Catherine Mary Stewart from THE LAST STARFIGHTER (1984) and WEEKEND AT BERNIE'S (1991) and Kelli Maroney from FAST TIMES AT RIDGEMONT HIGH (1982) and CHOPPING MALL (1986) join Ted for this rare 2-on-1 interview. Post-end-of-the-world life is good.

3.title: Adrienne King
3.plot: ADRIENNE KING: Hailing from New York, child-actress-turned-final-girl Adrienne King overcame many adversities to become a strong, inspiring heroine to her devoted fans. She is best known as Alice, the immortalized first of many final girls of the FRIDAY THE 13th movies.

4.title: Wendy McColm
4.plot: WENDY McCOLM: Hey America, it's Wendy!!. After years of acting in movies, TV, and her own self-written short films, award-winning LA actress/filmmaker Wendy McColm is ready to conquer the world with her first feature BIRDS WITHOUT FEATHERS (2018). With her story-telling/filmmaking genius, Wendy's going to be big in the industry before 2020.

1.title: Ace Talkingwolf
1.plot: Make-up effects artist and actor, Ace Talkingwolf, is one of the greatest the ATLWood has to offer Atlanta's film industry. Credits include: ACE THE ZOMBIE (2012) and ATLANTA VAMPIRE MOVIE (2015).

2.title: Tony Folden
2.plot: He's appeared in "Money Power & Respect: The Series," "Swamp Murders" and the award-winning HORROR HOTEL: THE WEBSERIES. Now he's writing his own material. Here's actor/screenwriter Tony Folden!!!

3.title: Lilith Stabs
3.plot: LILITH STABS: Star of such films as CREMAINS, MALEFIC, and ZOMBIEGEDDON (that's a Troma movie, peeps)! This is the enchanting Countess Lilith Stabs!

4.title: Ondie Daniel
4.plot: A prominent and talented actress, producer, make-up effects artist! One of the greatest entities in the ATLWood! This is Ondie Daniel!

5.title: Jevocas Green
5.plot: Actor/filmmaker/make-up artist/fan-film meister and all-around ATLWood bad-ass Java Green.

6.title: James Jarrett
6.plot: One of the most talented and intelligent entities to grace the industry! This is actor and Tintallin Entertainment founder, James Jarrett!

7.title: Jayson Palmer
7.plot: Filmmaker and co-founder of Blue Dusk Productions (with Chris Ethridge), the studio behind SURVIVOR TYPE (2011), A MATTER OF TIME (2014), and its biggest hit ATTACK OF THE MORNINGSIDE MONSTER (2014)! This is Jayson Palmer!!!

8.title: Chris Ethridge
8.plot: Filmmaker and co-founder of Blue Dusk Productions (with Jayson Palmer), the studio behind SURVIVOR TYPE (2011), A MATTER OF TIME (2014), and its biggest hit ATTACK OF THE MORNINGSIDE MONSTER (2014)! Here is Chris Ethridge!!!

9.title: Mike Stanley
9.plot: Mike Stanley is a jack-of-all-trades in the biz: actor/producer/writer and head of Skyshot Films. Here's one of the stars of Attack of the Morningside Monster (2014), the one-and-only Mike Stanley.

10.title: Ray Lloyd
10.plot: The legendary WCW pro-wrestler, Glacier, is now an actor in movies like "Popsy," "A Free Bird," "Attack of the Morningside Monster," and the upcoming "Slaw."

11.title: Tiffany Shepis
11.plot: Having starred in James Gunn's Troma movie, 'Tromeo and Juliet' (1996), scream queen Tiffany Shepis continues to blow us away in 'The Hazing' (2004), 'Sharknado 2' (2014), and countless other films.

12.title: P. J. Soles
12.plot: PJ has totally appeared in immortal classics such as 'Carrie' (1976), 'Halloween' (1978), 'Stripes' (1981), and 'The Devil's Rejects' (2005), among countless others. Here's everybody's favorite 'Rock 'N' Roll High School' sweetheart, the legendary PJ Soles!

13.title: Sid Haig
13.plot: Just as he was about to retire from his lengthy career in TV and movies (ending with Quentin Tarantino's JACKIE BROWN (1997)), Rob Zombie came along and asked Sid to be a clown in his movie HOUSE OF 1000 CORPSES (2003). Here's former-retiree-turned-horror-icon, the legendary Sid Haig!!!

14.title: Jamison Newlander
14.plot: Before there was Buffy, there were the Frog Brothers, the vampire-slaying bros from THE LOST BOYS (1987), and its sequels. Since then, actor Jamison Newlander (Alan Frog) has been keeping us safe from vampires and blobs (THE BLOB (1988), all while writing, directing, and starring in more great flicks. (Fair warning: do NOT sparkle!)

15.title: C. Martin Croker
15.plot: This ATLWood star is the legendary voice/animator behind Zorak and Moltar on "Space Ghost: Coast to Coast" and Dr. Weird and Steve from "Aqua Teen Hunger Force" among many others. Live from Cartoon Planet, our very own C. Martin Croker!!!

16.title: Chad Wood
16.plot: Local ATLWood make-up artist/actor guy, Chad Wood's work can be seen in "Criminal Behavior," "Welcome to the Bubs," and his main area of operation, Nightmare's Gate Haunted House!!!

17.title: Dave R. Watkins
17.plot: Apart from appearing in JACK O'LANTERN (2004) and AND ALL THROUGH THE HOUSE (2011), Dave R. Watkins is also the genius behind RETURN OF THE JACKALOPE (2006) and the immortal LUMBER BARON OF JASPER COUNTY (web series now filming for its 4th season). Let's see what makes Dave tick!

18.title: James Edward Thomas
18.plot: A true ATLWood pioneer James got his start as an Atlanta news guy before becoming an actor in Hollywood and then coming back to ATL to revive his career..

19.title: Dawn Compton
19.plot: The Otherside of Georgia Productions, utilizing the Casting Cauldron, has conjured up Miss "'Dawn' of the Dead" herself, Dawn Compton. Soon, she shall partake in the Otherside's unleashing of local horror indie film "TEST GROUP" (2015), and upcoming TV show "IMMORTALZ: ATLANTA." Life is so good!

20.title: John D'Angelo
20.plot: ATLWood's resident tough guy, star of UNKILLABLE (2014), C.I.G.A.R. (2014), and the upcoming CREATURE FEATURE (2015). When he's not acting, John enjoys martial arts and ring announcing.

21.title: Albert Roberts
21.plot: Combat vet-turned-actor/production manager Albert Roberts is the CEO of The Otherside of Georgia Productions - the local film company that's about to unleash TEST GROUP (2015) and IMMORTALZ: ATLANTA.

22.title: Rebecca Barnes
22.plot: Since moving to ATLWood from California, Rebecca Barnes has appeared in SACRIFICES (2014), en-Dash (2015) and an episode of CLAIRVOYANCE: THE ELLIS FILES (2015)and LUMBER BARON OF JASPER COUNTY (2015). Many more projects coming soon.

23.title: Kevin L. Powers
23.plot: Here is actor/writer/director/producer/cinematographer/cameraman/production manager/sound guy/editor/you name it-he am it/quintessential ATLWood powerhouse filmmaker-meister Kevin L Powers!

24.title: Edward Boss
24.plot: Edward Boss is an incredible ATLWood filmmaker and key player at Spirit World Productions, the company behind BURIED CAIN (2014), CREATURE FEATURE (2015), and DARK ROADS 79 (coming 2016)!

25.title: Keith Bailey
25.plot: He's lurked in the wardrobe and make-up departments, even behind the camera as writer, producer, and director! Now he's about to unleash his best and most terrifying work, including TEST GROUP (2015) and the upcoming TV sensation IMMORTALZ: ATLANTA! Here's ATLWood's future, Mr. Keith Bailey!

26.title: Tori Montgomery
26.plot: Tori Montgomery has mastered acting in both theatre and film. She can be seen in her own self-made "ANNALIESE: A LOVE STORY (2012), as well as TEST GROUP (2015), and IMMORTALZ: ATLANTA (coming to TV)!

27.title: Ben Bladon
27.plot: Ben Bladon co-stars in Test Group (2015) and the upcoming TV hit Immortalz: Atlanta, though he's not exactly a newcomer to ATLWood - Ben has been in "The Walking Dead" several times as eight different Walkers.

28.title: Lance Paul
28.plot: Hollywood actor/producer/storyboard-meister Lance Paul drops by to chat about REALM OF SOULS (2013), BURIED CAIN (2014), and the upcoming DARK ROADS 79 (2016 - now filming)

29.title: Grant Garlinghouse
29.plot: Best known as Mike from the LUMBER BARON OF JASPER COUNTY web series, Grant Garlinghouse has also been known to play with cameras and sound...and witches and Jackalopes!

30.title: Michael D. Friedman
30.plot: MICHAEL D. FRIEDMAN: ...and here's Michael D. Friedman! When he's not writing and directing flicks like RETURN OF THE JACKALOPE (2006), SALES (2007), and JOHNNY & FRANCISCO ATTEND A DINNER PARTY (2013), he's playing roles like Pete in LUMBER BARON OF JASPER COUNTY among many others!

31.title: Richard Tavernaro
31.plot: RICHARD TAVERNARO: Richard Tavernaro is a local actor/filmmaker who's appeared in several Hollywood flicks and has also made his own, including GIGGITY (2011), THE MALTESE MOOSE AND SQUIRREL (2014), and the upcoming horror parody SLAW (2016).

32.title: Eric E. Poe
32.plot: ERIC E. POE: Eric is yet another force to be reckoned with, having written and starring in JAR OF LIGHT (2013) and THE RETURN OF SPARROW MAN (2015) among many others - and starring in CABARET DIABOLIQUE (2015) and the upcoming TEST GROUP (2015)...among many others!

33.title: Jason Vail
33.plot: JASON VAIL: He's worked in NYC and ATLWood in various TV shows, now Jason Vail is partaking in cinematic masterpieces such as ABRAHAM LINCOLN vs ZOMBIES (2012), VALLEY OF THE SASQUATCH (2015), and CREATURE FEATURE (2015)!

34.title: Alpha Trivette
34.plot: ALPHA TRIVETTE: Coming from careers as a radio talk show host and stand-up comedian, Alpha Trivette brings his talent to film with THE PARADOX SUITCASE (2013), GARBAGE MEN (2015), and the upcoming SLAW: THE MOVIE (2016) among many others.

35.title: Troy Halverson
35.plot: TROY HALVERSON: ATLWood actor/filmmaker Troy Halverson co-starred in ATTACK OF THE MORNINGSIDE MONSTER (2014) and plays lead roles in MR. LOCKJAW (2015) and HORROR HOTEL: THE WEBSERIES.

36.title: Jax Kearney
36.plot: JAX KEARNEY: Jax Kearney has been creating art since childhood. After a stint with the Coast Guard, he traveled as a stand-up comedian. Now he lives in ATLWood and creates lovely shows like 5IVE (2011), MORNINGSTAR (2014), and, coming soon, NOIR THE SERIES (2015)!

37.title: Brian H. Teague
37.plot: BRIAN H. TEAGUE: Brian H. Teague went from making haunted houses at school to becoming a great ATLWood filmmaker. His company, Get the Horns, produces exciting gems like THE PARADOX SUITCASE (2013), 1580 AM (2014), and STOP DATE (2014)!

38.title: Ann Lukens
38.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Molly Loch
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Jacob Samedi
2.plot: JACOB SAMEDI: Murder Bunny Studios and Mayhem, Inc. present ATLwood actor/filmmaker Jacob Samedi, aka Krowface, from TEST GROUP (2015) and more carnage to come!

3.title: Ashia Moreno
3.plot: ASHIA MORENO: This lovely actress from TEST GROUP (2015) and BATTLE TECH: MERCENARIES (2016) is about to entice you as Susie Pyke in the web series SUSPENSION OF DISBELIEF (2015), and as Narobee in the upcoming IMMORTALZ ATLANTA!

4.title: Don Weir
4.plot: DON WEIR: QUICKIES is back with the power couple behind Devil Cat Studios, the new company behind many projects including QUICKIES!!! ATLwood filmmaker Don Weir and his photographer wife Andrea are open for business and ready to help make ATLwood the next movie capitol of the USA!

5.title: Madeline Brumby
5.plot: MADELINE BRUMBY: Madeline Brumby is an ATLwood scream queen/Go-Go Ghoul for Professor Morte's Silver Scream Spook Show. Besides appearing in DEAR GOD NO! (2011) and FRANKENSTEIN CREATED BIKERS (2015) among many others, she's also a make-up artist for "Your Pretty Face is Going to Hell." Enjoy!

6.title: Steven A. Grainger
6.plot: STEVEN A. GRAINGER: Steve Grainger is an actor/filmmaker behind COME GET SOME (2003), SUPER TROMETTE ACTION MOVIE GO (2008) and HOBO WITH A TRASH CAN (2015) among others, and even appeared in Troma's POULTRYGEIST: NIGHT OF THE CHICKEN DEAD (2006)! Yes, Steve has taken the big leap of faith from Atlanta to...Tromaville! Here's Steve, peoples!

7.title: Jayson Duckett
7.plot: JAYSON DUCKETT: This is Jayson Duckett! Having appeared in the award-winning TEST GROUP (2015) and slated to star in IMMORTALZ: ATLANTA among several others, Jayson is on his way to ATLwood stardom!

9.title: Brandy Mason
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Lloyd Kaufman
10.plot: LLOYD KAUFMAN: Having created the Toxic Avenger and SGT. Kabukiman, the immortal Lloyd Kaufman, king of indie filmmakers and president of Troma Entertainment, now realizes his greatest dream finally coming true...apparently, this interview clip with Ted!

11.title: April Bogenschutz
11.plot: APRIL BOGENSCHUTZ: April is having the time of her life starring in great films such as ATTACK OF THE MORNINGSIDE MONSTER (2014), DARK ROADS 79 (2016), and the upcoming BRING ME A DREAM (2017)! I really believe Hollywood is overdue on calling her (get on it, people!)!

1.title: Chase Smith
1.plot: Chase Smith is the award-winning actor/film-maker behind Spirit World Productions, the company behind the award-winning "DARK ROADS 79," and other horror gems. He is also the author of "HELL DEPARTED," an award-winning screenplay. Watch as Chase soon becomes ATLwood's multi-award-winning horror icon.

2.title: Dan Beck
2.plot: DAN BECK: A filmmaker from Wages of Cine (in Augusta), Dan has contributed to many fun shorts and web series including THE RETURN OF SPARROW MAN (2015) and 30 SECOND MOVIES (2014). Remember the names Dan Beck and Wages of Cine.

3.title: Jennifer Masty
3.plot: JENNIFER MASTY: Jennifer is a new ATLwood actress who started with RABID (2013) and became an IIFC Best Supporting Actress Award Nominee for the hit movie DARK ROADS 79 (2017) from Spirit World Productions.

4.title: Chance Kelley
4.plot: CHANCE KELLEY: Actor/Producer Chance Kelley has appeared in many TV episodes and several Spirit World Productions movies - most notably playing Eddie Rhodes in the award-winning DARK ROADS 79 (2017).

5.title: Loren W. Lepre
5.plot: LOREN W. LEPRE: Visiting from Pennsylvania, Actor/filmmaker Loren W. Lepre pimps out his film company Average Superstar Films and his masterpieces PENNSYLVANIA HARDCRE (2014) and THE DARK MILITARY (2017) among other gems .

6.title: Christopher G. Moore
6.plot: CHRISTOPHER G. MOORE: CGM is the actor/filmmaker behind award-winning shorts DISENGAGED (2015), KNOB GOBLINS (2015), and other neat flicks with his film company Cinema Fuel Productions.

7.title: Sonya Thompson
7.plot: SONYA THOMPSON: Having appeared in LUMBER BARON OF JASPER COUNTY (as Sam), THE WALKING DEAD (as a Walker), and various magazine covers (including Entertainment Weekly), the impending superstardom of ATLwood's own Sonya Thompson is inevitable.

8.title: Bill Moseley
8.plot: BILL MOSELEY: That's right. I got Bill Moseley. Bill Moseley has an incredible cult status having appeared in TEXAS CHAINSAW movies and various Rob Zombie movies, as well as DARK ROADS 79 (2017 - filmed here in Georgia). Need I really say more?

9.title: Heather Langenkamp
9.plot: HEATHER LANGENKAMP: This is horror icon Heather Langenkamp aka Nancy from the A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET movies. But she didn't stop there. She also appears in THE BUTTERFLY ROOM (2012) and STAR TREK INTO DARKNESS (2013) and many more to come.

10.title: David Bruckner
10.plot: DAVID BRUCKNER: David Bruckner is the ATLwood filmmaker behind THE SIGNAL (2007), V/H/S (2012) which spawned SiREN (2016), SOUTHBOUND (2015), and even had a cameo in the cult hit BEYOND THE GATES (2016).

11.title: Hannah Fierman
11.plot: HANNAH FIERMAN: QUICKIES is thrilled to present ATLwood's biggest scream queen Hannah Fierman. Besides winning awards as Geneva in AMERICAN HELL (2014), Hannah mesmerized us as the vamp Lily in V/H/S (2012) and again in SiREN (2016). By the way, Hannah likes you.

12.title: Brian K. Williams
12.plot: BRIAN K. WILLIAMS: Brian is an incredible award-winning indie filmmaker at Bandit Motion Pictures - the film company behind TIME TO KILL (2014), HARVEST LAKE (2016), and SPACE BABES FROM OUTER SPACE (2017) among other sexy gems. Welcome to ATLwood.

13.title: James Bickert
13.plot: JAMES BICKERT: Grindhouse and exploitation cinema has a king in ATLwood. The filmmaker behind DEAR GOD NO. (2011) and its sequel FRANKENSTEIN CREATED BIKERS (2016) proves that the drive-in is alive and well. Can't wait to see what James Bickert does next.

14.title: Ellie Church
14.plot: ELLIE CHURCH: Scream queens in ATLwood - yep, we got 'em. The award-winning Ellie Church has arrived and brought with her TIME TO KILL (2014), MANIA (2015), and SPACE BABES FROM OUTER SPACE (2017) among many other incredible staples to cult cinema. Welcome to ATLwood.

15.title: Sybil Danning
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: Matt Green
16.plot: Very influential in the film industry, Matt Green has contributed to some great ATLwood films (DANCE OF THE DEAD (2008), FRANKENSTEIN CREATED BIKERS (2016)) and given us many of his own gems (LOADED DICE (2007) and SLAW (2017)). Matt's star can only shine brighter from here.

17.title: Allison Maier
17.plot: A great ATLwood scream queen, Allison Maier graces the industry in SPRING BREAK ZOMBIE MASSACRE (2016), FRANKENSTEIN CREATED BIKERS (2016), and SPACE BABES FROM OUTER SPACE (2017) among others in cult cinema and many more to come.

18.title: Crystal R. Davis
18.plot: Not only is she a great actress (as seen on "Nashville" and "Homicide Hunter" among others), but Crystal R. Davis is also an wonderful human being. Crystal runs PhotoSafe Actor's Performance Services where she tapes auditions and coaches (encourages) us to be our best and get our gigs. Crystal is definitely one of ATLwood's most treasured peeps.

19.title: BarBara Luna
19.plot: Yeah, where does one even begin with BarBara Luna? The uber-versatile do-it-all legend has only been in zillions and zillions of TV shows (Star Trek, Buck Rogers, Fantasy Island, Mission: Impossible), too many to count here. Pay attention, peeps: This is how great TV was done back then, BarBara-style.

20.title: Daniel Roebuck
20.plot: Having started in CAVEGIRL (1985) and RIVER'S EDGE (1986) and continuing through various Rob Zombie movies, legendary Hollywood actor-turned-filmmaker Daniel Roebuck is here to discuss the biz and tout his future (self-made) projects...'cus I said he's also a filmmaker now...so yeah.

imdb.title: Quickies
